constituent: companion, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, moon2, month2, flesh2, part of the body2
heisigStory: The first companion that God made, as the Bible story goes, was Eve. Upon seeing her, Adam exclaimed, "Flesh of my flesh!" And that is precisely what this character says in so many strokes.
koohiiStory1: My companion and I are like two moons side by side.
koohiiStory2: Under the twin moons of Tatooine, Luke had no COMPANION.
